amendment.description: Amendment sought to cut $10,234,000 from the EPA Environmental Programs and Management Account enforcement line and increase the EPA spending reduction account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in House Report 115-297 to cut $10,234,000 from the EPA Environmental Programs and Management Account enforcement line and redirects funds to the EPA Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A070) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 228 (Roll no. 474).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A070) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 228 (Roll no. 474).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A070) offered by Mr. Biggs.
